snippet: In the last hours of Iran’s brief presidential election campaign, the name of the detained opposition leader who claimed to have won the last contest, Mir Hussein Moussavi, was once again chanted at public rallies.
abstract: In the last hours of Iran’s brief presidential election campaign, the name of the detained opposition leader who claimed to have won the last contest, Mir Hussein Moussavi, was once again chanted at public rallies.

headline.main: Detained Opposition Leader's Name Echoes at Rallies on Eve of Iran Vote
